COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent
v.
David Ryan BATES, Petitioner Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Respondent
v.
David Ryan Bates, Petitioner No. 380 WAL 2018
No. 381 WAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. March 13, 2019

ORDER

PER CURIAM

AND NOW, this 13th day of March, 2019, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
